name: Before I Fly
description:
Tonight is your final night on Earth. Soon you'll leave behind everything you've ever known. Will you be able to find closure in these last few hours? What will you think about? What will you remember? What will you let go of?

An interactive fiction piece made for OST Jam Vol. 2.

Music:

"Floating Up Above" - Alk1m123 https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCBe-gZeWIyYeYv_jXZUnvKg

"Entropeace" - HaruMKT https://hmkt.bandcamp.com/

"a train back to..." - Possums at Twilight https://twilightpossum.wixsite.com/home

"Some Day, All This Will Be Gone" - Abstraction http://abstractionmusic.com/

"From Stillness Comes Chaos" - Philip Aldous https://twitter.com/Palkid94

"quiet blur" - Steve Wilder Blumenthal https://www.wilderbluemusic.com/

"Accretia" - Atmospherium https://twitter.com/atmospherium

"WORLD STAGE CHAOS" - madbrain https://twitter.com/MrMadbrain
